sentences: COP 13 President Rachmat Witoelar (Indonesia) opened the meeting, describing it as an important bridge from Bali to Copenhagen.
Delegates then elected Maciej Nowicki, Minister of Environment of Poland, as COP 14 President.
He stated that the key goal in PoznaÅ was to articulate a shared vision.
Poland s Prime Minister Donald Tusk urged global solidarity and said the economic crisis should not dampen countries determination to combat climate change.

Anders Fogh Rasmussen, Prime Minister of Denmark, said combating climate change was the right choice both from an environmental and economic perspective. IPCC Chair Rajendra Pachauri highlighted scientific realities and urged consideration of whether limiting temperature rise to 2°C would be sufficient. UNFCCC Executive Secretary Yvo de Boer highlighted recent progress and the assembly paper from the AWG-LCA Chair summarizing parties views.
